title: Elon Musk
summary: Elon Reeve Musk is a naturalized American entrepreneur, engineer, and business magnate known for founding companies in electric vehicles, spaceflight, AI, and digital payments. He founded SpaceX (2002), became Tesla's CEO (2008), and established Neuralink, The Boring Company, and xAI. In 2022, he acquired Twitter for $44 billion, rebranding it as X. His companies have achieved significant milestones like SpaceX's reusable rockets and Tesla's electric vehicle production. Musk's net worth exceeded $400 billion, making him the world's richest person.
structure: Role in Tesla and Electric Vehicles
Acquisition and Transformation of Twitter into X

factual.claim: Musk founded SpaceX in 2002 with $100 million from PayPal sale
Tesla delivered 1.79 million vehicles globally in 2024
Musk has fathered at least 12 children as of 2025

interpretive.statement: Musk presented as a transformative but controversial figure
Highlights vision of multiplanetary human existence and technological innovation
Analysis of technological ambitions with recognition of controversies
